identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
anti_patterns: No pure black (#000000) on pure white (#FFFFFF)

rules: Use 2px solid borders (border-2 border-stone-900) on interactive elements for tactile feel
Pastel backgrounds must have high contrast text (WCAG AA compliant)
Active states should physically move (translate-y-1) to mimic buttons

layout.spacing: Relaxed (p-4 to p-8 mobile, p-12 desktop)
mobile_rules: Important actions (Add Sale) within thumb reach (bottom 30% of screen)

SalesCounter.description: Core interaction component. Big, chunky buttons.
SalesCounter.style: Flex row, gap-4, buttons w-16 h-16 rounded-xl border-2 border-stone-900 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(28,25,23,1)] active:shadow-none active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] transition-all

ProductCard.description: Visual representation of item with inline controls
ProductCard.style: bg-white border-2 border-stone-900 rounded-2xl p-4 shadow-sm flex flex-col gap-2

ReceiptHistory.style: bg-white border-x-2 border-t-2 border-stone-900 jagged-bottom-edge p-6 font-mono text-sm

tech_stack.icons: Lucide React (ShoppingBag, Plus, Minus, History, Settings)

instructions_to_main_agent: PHASE 1: Setup 'idb' first. Create a 'db.js' utility to handle all offline storage (Stores: products, sales, settings).
PHASE 2: Build the 'ProductCard' with the 'Neo-Brutalist' shadow styles defined in colors.rules.
PHASE 3: Implement the Sales Dashboard. It must be instant. Optimistic UI updates.
PHASE 4: Create the 'Receipt' view for History using the 'ReceiptHistory' style.
PHASE 5: PDF Export. Map the 'sales' store to a clean table format.
CRITICAL: Do not use 'alert()'. Use 'sonner' for 'Sale Recorded' toasts.
CRITICAL: Ensure all buttons have 'min-h-[48px]' for touch accessibility.
CRITICAL: The 'Done/Fatto' button should be massive and fixed at the bottom or top-right, distinct from product counters.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Use 2px black borders for that 'Pop' comic/artisan feel.
Every interactive element needs a data-testid.
Background color should be #FDFBF7 (Warm Paper) not #FFFFFF (Sterile).
